headline: ‘Atomic Bomb’ Of Fires Sends Nation on Run
abstract: With more than a month still to go in the fire season, the government announced a large-scale use of military assets, a deployment not seen since World War II.
lead_paragraph: HASTINGS, Australia — The evacuees walked down the gangway of the giant naval vessel to the dock, each carrying just a few items of luggage. Some held infants and others their dogs, whose legs were still shaky from the 20-hour voyage down the coast of Australia. They were weary, and their clothes smelled of smoke, but the terrible infernos were finally behind them.
